error.browserSupport: Notifications push are not supported by your browser

notificationRequest.title: Notification request
notificationRequest.content: This app need to have access to the notifications to send you alert if you have been in contact with someone how has COVID-19

Silde1.title: Welcome
Silde1.description: BlockCovid is the tracking application against COVID via QR Code

Silde2.title: How does it works ?
Silde2.description:
Scan the Qr codes you find and you job is done !
If you have been in contact in the last 10 days with a citizen who has been tested positive, you will receive a notification.

Silde3.title: Register
Silde3.description: No personal data is recorded, we only keep in our database the place you've been.

HistoryDetailsPage.doctor_before_date_message: You have been tested positive on
HistoryDetailsPage.location_before_date_message: You have scanned this place on

error.unsupportedQrCode: The QR code is not supported by this application

error.422: Impossible to send the information to the server

error.doctor_404: The scanned QR Code is invalid. This doctor doesn't exist or has been deleted
error.location_404: The scanned QR Code is invalid. This location doesn't exist or has been deleted
